amendment.description: To modify the priority afforded applications for national defense tank vessel construction assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3339 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7152-7160; text: CR S7158) To modify the priority afforded applications for national defense tank vessel construction assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3339 proposed by Senator Levin.
